title: Exquisite Navratna and Rice Pearl Floral Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: this Haaram features genuine Navratna gemstones (30 stones totaling 20.26 carats)
and lustrous rice pearls (62 pearls totaling 60.63 carats). Finished with a signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance and lasting shine.
features: This stunning haaram showcases a contemporary floral design, meticulously handcrafted to highlight the vibrant colors of the Navratna gemstones. The rice pearls are artfully arranged to create delicate floral accents, while the diamonds add a touch of modern sparkle. The design balances tradition with contemporary aesthetics, making it a truly unique piece.
colors: The color palette is a rich blend of traditional Navratna hues
complemented by the warm glow of 18K gold and the sparkle of brilliant-cut diamonds. The combination of colors creates a vibrant and auspicious appearance.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional occasions like weddings (Vivaaham)
as well as contemporary events and celebrations. This Haaram will add a touch of regal elegance to any ensemble.
description: This Navratna Haaram is not just a piece of jewelry; it's an investment in tradition and artistry. The Navratnas hold significant cultural value and are believed to bring good fortune. The exquisite craftsmanship and attention to detail make this a truly heirloom-worthy piece that will be cherished for generations. The blend of traditional and contemporary design ensures it remains a timeless classic.
